p: In order to prevent infection to the population and healthcare workers, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention encourage following simple everyday preventive actions such as to avoid close contact with sick people, to avoid touching the eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands, to wear a face mask and to frequently wash the hands with soap and water or with alcohol-based hand sanitizers [ 22]. Health promotion campaigns are encouraged in China and globally as part of educating the people to reduce the risk of infection transmission. By educating the people, it is less likely they will get the infection, thus reducing the risk of transmitting the disease to others.
